alert.note: Alert for East Puget Sound Lowlands; San Juan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 2:41AM PST until January 06 at 2:00AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 2 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. * WHERE...San Juan County, including Stuart Island, Waldron Island, Orcas Island, San Juan Island, Lopez Island, Blakely Island, and Decatur Island and East Puget Sound Lowlands from Snohomish County to Pierce County, including Arlington, Gold Bar, Duvall, Snoqualmie, Buckley, and Eatonville. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 2 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expected locally gusty east to northeast winds. A brief period of light freezing rain is possible late this evening or early Thursday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: East Puget Sound Lowlands; San Juan County
